mapper.insert: insert into teacher(t_loginid, t_name, t_subject, t_class, t_pw, t_phone, t_email) values(#{t_loginid}, #{t_name}, #{t_subject}, #{t_class}, #{t_pw}, #{t_phone}, #{t_email})
mapper.update: update teacher set t_loginid = #{t_loginid}, t_name = #{t_name}, t_subject = #{t_subject}, t_class=#{t_class}, t_pw=#{t_pw}, t_phone=#{t_phone}, t_email=#{t_email}
mapper.select: select count(*) as result from teacher where t_loginid = #{t_loginid}
